1.4.5.commit_description: Pull in fixes from skeevy420. Fixes: https://github.com/phoronix-test-suite/phoronix-test-suite/pull/552

1.4.4.commit_description: Add sp.c, adjust process count per https://www.phoronix.com/forums/forum/phoronix/phoronix-test-suite/1257554-how-to-enable-verbose-output#post1257618

1.4.1.commit_description: Add --alow-run-as-root, ended up being missed until now.

1.4.0.commit_description: Update against upstream NPB 3.4, add new test cases.

1.3.0.commit_description: Use physical core count rather than logical cores to avoid MPI breaking on high core count systems with SMT.

1.2.3.commit_description: Update MPI handling, add some larger test sizes

1.2.1.commit_description: MG.B and IS.D do not build / run properly on modern systems.

1.2.0.commit_description: Working on new version of NPB test that makes use of some of the HPCC test profile MPI improvements and other multi-core/cluster work for better benchmarking. Seems to have MPI rank errors right now though for NPB on this build.

1.1.1.commit_description: Remove tests not in MPI NPB version.

1.1.0.commit_description: Switch to the MPI version of NPB benchmarks.
